dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2445 IH: To express the sense of Congress with respect to enabling Food and Drug Administration scientific engagement.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Guthrie introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To express the sense of Congress with respect to enabling Food and Drug Administration scientific engagement.

section.text: It is the sense of Congress that participation in or sponsorship of scientific conferences and meetings is essential to the mission of the Food and Drug Administration.
